description: Returns a paginated list of premigration assessment runs based on filter settings. These filter settings can specify a combination of premigration assessment runs, migration tasks, replication instances, and assessment run status values.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the premigration assessment runs described in the form of key-value pairs. Valid filter names: replication-task-assessment-run-arn, replication-task-arn, replication-instance-arn, status (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token returned for you to pass to a subsequent request. If you pass this token as the Marker value in a subsequent request, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified in the request by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskAssessmentRuns
nested_items.description: One or more premigration assessment runs as specified by Filters.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskAssessmentRunArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the migration task associated with this premigration assessment run.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Assessment run status.
"cancelling" --- The assessment run was canceled by the CancelReplicationTaskAssessmentRun operation.
"deleting" --- The assessment run was deleted by the DeleteReplicationTaskAssessmentRun operation.
"failed" --- At least one individual assessment completed with a failed status.
"error-provisioning" --- An internal error occurred while resources were provisioned (during provisioning status).
"error-executing" --- An internal error occurred while individual assessments ran (during running status).
"invalid state" --- The assessment run is in an unknown state.
"passed" --- All individual assessments have completed, and none has a failed status.
"provisioning" --- Resources required to run individual assessments are being provisioned.
"running" --- Individual assessments are being run.
"starting" --- The assessment run is starting, but resources are not yet being provisioned for individual assessments.
"warning" --- At least one individual assessment completed with a warning status or all individual assessments were skipped (completed with a skipped status).

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskAssessmentRunCreationDate
nested_items.description: Date on which the assessment run was created using the StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun operation.

nested_items.name: AssessmentProgress
nested_items.description: Indication of the completion progress for the individual assessments specified to run.

nested_items.name: IndividualAssessmentCount
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that are specified to run.

nested_items.name: IndividualAssessmentCompletedCount
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that have completed, successfully or not.

nested_items.name: LastFailureMessage
nested_items.description: Last message generated by an individual assessment failure.

nested_items.name: ServiceAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the service role used to start the assessment run using the StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun operation. The role must allow the iam:PassRole action.

nested_items.name: ResultLocationBucket
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 bucket where DMS stores the results of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: ResultLocationFolder
nested_items.description: Folder in an Amazon S3 bucket where DMS stores the results of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: ResultEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: Encryption mode used to encrypt the assessment run results.

nested_items.name: ResultKmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the KMS encryption key used to encrypt the assessment run results.

nested_items.name: AssessmentRunName
nested_items.description: Unique name of the assessment run.

nested_items.name: IsLatestTaskAssessmentRun
nested_items.description: Indicates that the following PreflightAssessmentRun is the latest for the ReplicationTask. The status is either true or false.

nested_items.name: ResultStatistic
nested_items.description: Result statistics for a completed assessment run, showing aggregated statistics of IndividualAssessments for how many assessments were passed, failed, or encountered issues such as errors or warnings.

nested_items.name: Passed
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that successfully passed all checks in the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Failed
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that failed to meet the criteria defined in the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that encountered a critical error and could not complete properly.

nested_items.name: Warning
nested_items.description: Indicates that the recent completed AssessmentRun triggered a warning.

nested_items.name: Cancelled
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that were cancelled during the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Skipped
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that were skipped during the assessment run.
